questionText.text: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Mars is known as the Red Planet.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Mars.

questionText.text: Which of the following are dwarf planets?

quiz.instructionText: Select all correct answers and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Pluto and Ceres are classified as dwarf planets.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: Mars and Earth are not dwarf planets.

questionText.text: Which was the first artificial satellite sent into space?

quiz.instructionText: Select the correct answer and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Sputnik 1 was the first artificial satellite.

wrongFbText.text: Incorrect: The correct answer is Sputnik 1.

questionText.text: Which of the following are moons of Jupiter?

quiz.instructionText: Select all correct answers and select Submit.

correctFbText.text: Correct: Io and Europa are moons of Jupiter.

questionText.text: Which planet has the most moons?

correctFbText.text: Correct: Saturn has the highest number of confirmed moons.
